articles.title: European Space Agency Shares Video Of 'Spooky' Volcano That Spews Bright Blue Flames - NDTV
articles.description: Geologists call it the ''largest acid barrel on Earth'', due to its high concentration of sulfuric acid and various minerals, which also give the lake its stunning blue-greenish colour.
articles.content:
It is a volcanic crater, full of acid that also spits blue flames.
European Space Agency (ESA) on Saturday shared a mesmerising video of a volcanic lake that spews bright blue lava. The video was sh… [+2034 chars]
